# transportStateProc

**Instance Property**

Your callback function that provides audio transport state information (*play*, *rewind*, and so on) to an audio unit. May be `NULL`.

## Declaration

```swift
var transportStateProc: HostCallback_GetTransportState?
```
title: transportStateProc
